data.text: @PeterNimmo1 I have it on DVD, you can borrow it if you want.
@PeterNimmo1 Possibly too close to the bone just now
@StephenCVGraham Apologies- You Only Live Twice, On Her Majesty's Secret Service and The Spy Who Loved Me
@StephenCVGraham But never made starred in Last of the Summer Wine, sadly

@StephenCVGraham True. So we should add him to the list of actors who have sorry of played Bond, alongside Woody Allen and Peter Sellers.
And he's also in Thunderball https://t.co/pplOXzopuA
@PeterNimmo1 Maybe on Britbox, they want your £££&
@KeefFan Yes. They put a lot of good archive in iPlayer (Face to Face with Martin Luther King, Carl Jung et al), but not, unaccountably, Claudius
@StephenCVGraham He was apparently Ian Fleming's choice to play James Bond!
@PeterNimmo1 Put it on i Player at least.
